headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Texas Pacific Land (TPL) After The Recent Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Texas Pacific Land is priced attractively at its current level, you are not alone. The answer depends heavily on how you look at its value. The stock last closed at US$531.95, with returns of 24.7% over 7 days, 53.3% over 30 days, 78.5% year to date, 24.5% over 1 year and 363.6% over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Texas Pacific Land's role as a large landholder in the US energy sector and how investor attention around energy related assets can influence...
